page.title: 14'JUST CALL ME PETER'
page.content: In the spring of 1985 the Reverend Peter Stell became the vicar of the {"SHARED CHURCH" of St.Francis}in Thorpe Willoughby.(See p.6) "I see Thorpe Willoughby as an extremely exciting challenge. I find that the team ministry of which I am part,works well and is based on mutual trust and understanding." Peter Stell worked in retailing and market research in the Leeds area before training for the ministry at Salisbury and Wells Theological College. At college Peter was trained in radio and television techniques and has had his own spot on Radio Leeds for the last four years. Peter's wife Linda worked as a bank clerk in Salisbury whilst he was at college. They have a two year old son, Mark.
